definition: Siku Quanshu (collection of books compiled during Qing dynasty)
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Different colors in book cover were adopted for a good presentation and easy identification.
sentences.chinese: 爲了美觀和便於識別，《四庫全書》採用分色裝潢。

sentences.english: What Kinds of Books are Yongle Dadian and Siku Quanshu?
sentences.chinese: 《永樂大典》和《四庫全書》是什麼樣的書？

sentences.english: In the interest of beauty and convenience for recognition, every category of the encyclopedia was decorated in one single color.
sentences.chinese: 爲了美觀和便於識別，《四庫全書》採用分色裝潢。

sentences.english: The Slku Quan Cun Mu Shu should be published.
sentences.chinese: 《四庫全書存目叢書》應當出版。

sentences.english: In Spring 1999, an electronic version of Si Ku Quan Shu(Complete Library of the Four Branches of Literature) was published.
sentences.chinese: 年春，《文淵閣四庫全書》電子版問世。

sentences.english: It used to collect Book Collection and Authorized Books.
sentences.chinese: 曾珍藏過《古今圖書集成》和《四庫全書》各一部。

sentences.english: June 24, 1994 CunMu epitaphs series of the first book published .
sentences.chinese: 《四庫全書存目叢書》首冊出版。

sentences.english: There are lots of errors in Complete library in the Four Branches of Literature due to a variety of reasons.
sentences.chinese: 《四庫全書總目》由於種種原因，存在着諸多問題。

definition: the four book depositories, namely: classics 經|经, history 史, philosophy 子[zi3], belles-lettres 集

the Thirteen Confucian Classics, namely: Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], Book of History 尚書|尚书[Shang4 shu1], Rites of Zhou 周禮|周礼[Zhou1 li3], Rites and Ceremonies 儀禮|仪礼[Yi2 li3], Classic of Rites 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], Mr Zuo's Annals 左傳|左传[Zuo3 Zhuan4], Mr Gongyang's Annals 公羊傳|公羊传[Gong1 yang2 Zhuan4], Mr Guliang's Annals 穀梁傳|谷梁传[Gu3 liang2 Zhuan4], The Analects 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], Erya 爾雅|尔雅[Er3 ya3], Classic of Filial Piety 孝經|孝经[Xiao4 jing1], Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3]
variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
entire book/unabridged book/entire multi-volume work/comprehensive volume
